About

This blog

Welcome to my blog, just a little space for myself.

Putting down my thoughts, practicing my writing.

Main inspirations: Julia Evans and Jon Bois, I wanna try writing like them.

My current areas of exploration is in knowledge tools, to help me be smart

And application of ML to games, because games are fun!


Myself

Hello, my name is Stas Kalinowski. I live in Surrey, B.C.

I like computers, reading, and games. I occasionally write.

Personal Inspirations/Role Models: Julia Evans, Jon Bois, Michael Nielsen, Day9, and Arnold Schwarzenegger

Feel free to reach out to me on twitter or through my email!
